X[M] /*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- lib:anger:mood (M) This script will look at various things and bump the 'ANGRY' mood accordingly. lib:init (M) As the anger lib is loaded, we add 'ANGRY' to the list of moods. ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

X[M] /*
D=This script will look at various things and bump the 'ANGRY' mood accordingly.
*/
/* None, as of yet. Suggestions? kalle.alm@home.se or S7, or poke me directly (SC Kalle). :) */

X[M] /*
D=As the anger lib is loaded, we add 'ANGRY' to the list of moods.
*/
Call( this, "core:add_mood", \$mood: "ANGRY" );
